title: Gambling Week: Super Bowl Bets from favorites to long shots with Kelly Stewart (Football 9/2)
description:
Kelly Stewart is gambling expert that can be found in a ton of places including here on the Pick Six podcast today. Kelly and host Will Brinson talk Super Bowl bets. Is there any value in the favorites? As you'll hear, the mid-tier of teams might be the place to target for a season-long futures ticket. It's the first time in a while the Patriots can be classified as 'mid-tier' in terms of odds, but are they worth wagering on? Lastly, the long shots. Who is the sneaky pick of 2020?
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @kellyinvegas
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
